page.title: 19THE LOCAL DIALECT
page.content: The people in the area seem to have their own language,which can be difficult to understand to any new person moving into the area.The people who talk in this strange language are locally known as 'Cowinheeaders',but nowadays 'Cowinheeaders' are becoming quite a rarity,as more and more people move into the area.The present generation no longer pick up these local words and so do not carry on the traditional language.So in the future will this strange language disappear forever,only to be read about? Here are some examples: {GAWP - TO STARE.} {MOITHERED - WORRIED ANXIOUS.} {KRONKED - SETTLED DOWN. } {JADED - BORED OR WORN OUT. } {WHEW - MILL WHISTLE. } {TWINED AS A WASP - VERY ANNOYED.}
